title: SmartStore Large Plastic Under Bed Storage Boxes with Lid and Wheels- 2 Pack - 60L - Transparent Foldable Lid - Strong Clips - Recycled Plastic Storage Boxes - 10 Year Guarantee - L79 x W59 x H18.5 cm
features: 60L HIGH QUALITY PLASTIC UNDERBED STORAGE BOXES WITH LIDS - 2 pack- SmartStore Bedroller is a practical large underbed storage box with wheels. Perfect for under the bed, or anywhere in the home, office or workplace. Perfect for storing clothes, textiles and toys. Also suitable for blankets, cushions, pillows and quilts. Fits in spaces at least 18.6cm tall. Dimensions: Outer: L79 x W59 x H18.5 cm. Inner: L70 x W51.5 x H16.5 cm.

10 YEAR GUARANTEE - As part of SmartStore's promise we offer a 10-year manufacturers guarantee on all of our storage boxes as we believe they are built to last. Every box features reinforced corners providing optimum strength.

STURDY WHEELS & STRONG CLIP CLOSURES - Four integrated wheels make the underbed storage boxes easy to handle. The sturdy closure clips on either side of the storage box secure the lid firmly in place, keeping things in place.

SUITABLE FOR SMALL SPACES: The foldable lid enables using the clothes storage boxes even in small spaces. The see-through lid provides perfect visibility of the contents and makes it easy to find what you are looking for. The durable box is made of 62% recycled plastic, making it so easy to wipe-clean.

ROBUST BOX - Made from Polypropylene material which has high shock, impact and wear resistance and makes them so easy to clean. SmartStore storage boxes can withstand temperatures from -40c to +100c, so they can be stored where you see fit.
description: From the manufacturer Made from 62% recycled plastic Recyclable Withstand range: -40°C to 100°C Made in Finland SmartStore Bedroller Underbed Storage The SmartStore large bedroller with lid and four wheels is perfect for maximising the storage space in your home. The box easily rolls under the bed, and the foldable lid makes it convenient to use even in smaller spaces. The durable box is made of recycled plastic and comes in a light colour finish so it will suit all kinds of interiors. The see-through lid provides perfect visibility of the contents and makes it easy to find what you are looking for. Strong clips keep the lid firmly in place. Small SmartStore Bedroller Storage Boxes: 60l - 1 Pack Small SmartStore Bedroller Storage Boxes: 60l - 2 Pack Storage Boxes From our classic and colourful storage solutions to our extra strong and waterproof boxes, our range of stackable containers are perfect for all situations. Food Storage Airtight, stackable, and modular solutions that keep food dry and fresh. Our selection of fridge and cupboard containers will keep your kitchen perfectly organised. Home Organisation Baskets, boxes, bins and bundles of high quality organisational solutions make up our range of clever containers for keeping your home tidy. Sorting & Recycling Our award-winning storage solutions for sustainable living. The modular concepts are designed to make sorting and recycling easy and integrated into everyday life. Sustainable Solutions Our range of storage solutions are made from either recycled materials or can be recycled after use. All our factories are ISO 14001 and 9001-certified for environmental and quality management and we are aiming towards carbon neutrality in our production by 2030. Nordic Design SmartStore's Scandinavian design is all about creating a clean and minimalistic look that is sure to remain appealing for years to come. For an uncluttered way to declutter, our practical storage is made with thoughtful craftmanship that combines functionality with a simple, enduring style. Premium Quality At SmartStore, we embody a relentless commitment to delivering the highest quality storage solutions. Every small design detail matters and we only use safe and tested raw materials in production. This constant drive for excellence has resulted in strong, durable, and reliable boxes that stand the test of time.
